creditline:
John DeLaittre Memorial Collection
Gift of funds from Mrs. Horace Ropes

Gift of Mrs. Horace Ropes, in memory of her father, John De Laittre
description: Court scene; two ladies in empire-stylized dresses in center, a man in roughly contemporary garb to proper right, two other men in proper left background; pillars, archways and trees behind; illustration for poem 'La Merveilleuse' by Henri de Reginer
medium: Pen, ink, watercolor, gouache and gilt on paper
title: La Merveilleuse au Palais Royal
